code: import React from'react';import Modal from'react-modal';import"./MypageCss.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MypageModal=_ref=>{let{modalOpen,cancelList,handleButtonClick,handleComment}=_ref;const msg=()=>{switch(handleComment){case'movie':return'예매를 정말 취소하시겠습니까?';case'item':return'상품을 정말 취소하시겠습니까?';case'delAccount':return'정말 회원 탈퇴하시겠습니까?';case'obo':return'정말 삭제하시겠습니까?';case'editMember':return'정말 수정하시겠습니까?';case'comment':return'정말 삭제하시겠습니까?';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{isOpen:modalOpen,contentLabel:"Example Modal",style:{content:{top:"50%",left:"50%",right:"auto",bottom:"auto",marginRight:"-50%",transform:"translate(-50%, -50%)",width:"500px"}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:msg()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modalBtn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mypageModal",onClick:()=>handleButtonClick(cancelList),children:"\uD655\uC778"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mypageModal",onClick:()=>handleButtonClick("Cancel"),children:"\uCDE8\uC18C"})]})]});};export default MypageModal;
